EmailTemplate.description: cloned from the withbutton template, has banner
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.020 March GET Webinar Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Webinar Pivotal FY20 Priorities for Partners - Wednesday, Mar 13, 1PM EST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
This Wednesday I'd like to invite you to the March 2019 Global Ecosystem webinar where I’ll take you through Pivotal’s latest messaging and our FY20 partner priorities. February marked our new Financial Year and we’re excited to share what we are doing to better align with our SI partners to accelerate customer outcomes and the market for us all.
Date: Wednesday, March 13, 2019 Time: 1PM EDT / 10AM PDT
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Thank you, Danny Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
